name: Eldritch Invocations
effects: you gain one Eldritch Invocation of your choice from the invocation list
limits: you must meet an invocation's prerequisites to learn it
whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one invocation with another for which you qualify
you cannot replace an invocation if it is a prerequisite for another invocation you have
when you gain certain Warlock levels, you gain more invocations as shown in the Warlock Features table
you cannot pick the same invocation more than once unless its description says otherwise

notes: The chosen Pact Boon is represented as an invocation (inv.pact_of_the_*).
Additional invocations should be added as inv.* shards and referenced in the class selection system.
This shard defines the framework for invocations. Individual invocations are separate inv.* shards.
Later: add a warlock invocation catalog + selection counts by level if you ingest the Warlock class table.
